document.full_text: for a star player earning $27 million, a $100,000 fine ' about 0.4 percent of his salary ' is far less imposing than if he were suspended for a playoff game.
document.title: sports of the times: bryant should have been forced to sit
lines_and_colors: for a star player earning $27 million, a $100,000 fine ' about 0.4 percent of his salary ' is far less imposing than if he were suspended for a playoff game.
